name: Maurice Dugowson

roles_in_work.title: Lily Aime Moi = Lily, Love Me

biography: Maurice Dugowson (23 September 1938 â€“ 11 November 1999) was a French film director and screenwriter. His 1975 film Lily, aime-moi was entered into the 25th Berlin International Film Festival. The following year, his film F comme Fairbanks was entered into the 26th Berlin International Film Festival. In 1981 his film Bye, See You Monday was entered into the 12th Moscow International Film Festival.
